title: OMC-JSON schema v2.0
$comment:
Copyright 2021-2023 Motion Picture Laboratories, Inc.
SPDX-License-Identifier: APACHE-2.0

Character.title: Character
Character.description: A sentient entity (usually a person but not always) in the script whose specific identity is consequential to the narrative. A Character is generally identified by a specific name.

name.title: Asset name
name.description: The primary name used for the character

description.title: Character Description
description.description: A brief description of the character

physicalCharacteristics.title: Physical Characteristics
physicalCharacteristics.description: Allows for the the description of certain physical characteristics on a character, things that might be useful to an art department, wardrobe or casting for example.

species.title: Species
species.description: A species to which this character belongs

hairColor.title: Hair Color
hairColor.description: The hair color of the character

hairLength.title: Hair Length
hairLength.description: The length of hair of the character

eyeColor.title: Eye Color
eyeColor.description: The color of the characters eyes

Context.title: Context

name.title: Context name
name.description: A human readable name for the Context

description.title: Description
description.description: A brief description of the context

contextType.title: Context Type
contextType.description: A classifiaction of the type of context represented

For.title: Context For
For.description: The entities for which this Context applies to

Context.description: Informs scope within the construction process of a Creative Work.

name.title: Creative Work name
name.description: The primary name used for the creative work

description.title: Creative Work Description
description.description: A brief description of the creative work

workingTitle.title: Creative Work Working Title
workingTitle.description: The working title of the work

officialTitle.title: Creative Work Official Title
officialTitle.description: The official title of the work

internalTitle.title: Creative Work Internal Title
internalTitle.description: The internal title of the work

Depiction.title: Depiction

name.title: Depiction Styling Name
name.description: A human readable name for the styling

description.title: Depiction Description
description.description: A brief description of the depiction or portrayal

depictionType.title: Object type
depictionType.description: A categorization of the type of depiction

Depiction.description: The representation of something from a narrative entity by a production entity in the Creative Work, specified or implied by the Script.

Effect.title: Effect

name.title: Narrative Effect Name
name.description: A human readable name for the effect

description.title: Narrative Object Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative effect

effectType.title: Object type
effectType.description: A categorization of the type of effect.

Effect.description: An on screen visual effect considered essential to the narrative.

NarrativeAudio.title: Narrative Audio

name.title: Narrative Object Name
name.description: A human readable name for the audio clip

description.title: Narrative Audio Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative audio

narrativeType.title: Object type
narrativeType.description: A categorization of the type of audio.

NarrativeAudio.description: A named piece of audio significant to the narrative.

NarrativeLocation.title: Narrative Location

name.title: Narrative Location Name
name.description: A human readable name for the location

description.title: Narrative Location Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative location

NarrativeLocation.description: A location specified or implied by the narrative.

NarrativeObject.title: Narrative Object

name.title: Narrative Object Name
name.description: A human readable name for the object

description.title: Narrative Object Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative object

narrativeType.title: Object type
narrativeType.description: A departmental categorization for the object.

NarrativeObject.description: A named object related to or interacting with characters that is implied or understood to be necessary for the narrative. Includes items like props, wardrobe, set dressing and vehicles.

NarrativeScene.title: Narrative Scene

name.title: Scene  Name
name.description: A human readable name for the scene

sceneName.title: Narrative Scene Name
sceneName.description: A human readable name for the scene

fullName.title: Scene full name
fullName.description: A full descriptive name for the scene

altName.title: Scene alternate name
altName.description: An alternate, often shorter, name used in applications to identify the scenes

description.title: Narrative Scene Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative scene

sceneNumber.title: Scene Number
sceneNumber.description: A number used in the script to refer to the scene

items.title: Slugline
items.description: An arbitrary note or comment pertaining to the entity

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for the note or annotation

text.title: Text
text.description: The text of the note or annotation

NarrativeScene.description: Taken from the narrative itself and traditionally defined by creative intent and typically a unity of time, place, action, or theme.

NarrativeStyling.title: Narrative Styling

name.title: Narrative Styling Name
name.description: A human readable name for the styling

description.title: Narrative Styling Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative styling

narrativeType.title: Object type
narrativeType.description: A categorization of the type styling.

NarrativeStyling.description: Styling required to prepare an actor for their role

NarrativeWardrobe.title: Narrative Wardrobe

name.title: Narrative Styling Name
name.description: A human readable name for the styling

description.title: Narrative Wardrobe Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative wardrobe

narrativeType.title: Object type
narrativeType.description: A categorization of the type wardrobe

NarrativeWardrobe.description: The clothing for a Character in the narrative.

ProductionLocation.title: Production Location

name.title: Production Location Name
name.description: A human readable name for the location

description.title: Production Location Description
description.description: A brief description of the production location

locationType.description: Describes whether this is production location or more specifically a shooting location

ProductionLocation.description: A real place that is used to depict the Narrative Location or used for creating the production.

ProductionScene.title: Production Scene

name.title: Asset name
name.description: A human readable name for the production scene

description.title: Asset description
description.description: A human readable description of the production scene

sceneHeader.title: Scene Header
sceneHeader.description: Used when referring to the Production Scene. It is generally synonymous with Slugline and is used to divide a Script into scenes.

sceneDescriptor.title: Scene Descriptor
sceneDescriptor.description: An alphanumeric reference to a Production Scene

sceneNumber.title: Scene Number
sceneNumber.description: A number tied to a Slugline when a Script is locked

ProductionScene.description: Defined either by explicit divisions in the structure of the Script, e.g., by a Slugline, or by additional capture for use in the Creative Work that is not tied to any particular Scene in the Script.

Sequence.title: Sequence

name.title: Sequence Name
name.description: A human readable name for the editorial sequence

description.description: A brief description of the sequence
description.title: Sequence description

version.title: Sequence Version Information
version.description: A particular form, variant, or representation of an Asset that differs in some way from its source Asset.

name.title: A name for this specific version of the Asset

description.title: Asset description
description.description: A human readable description of the version

annotation.description: A collection of notes specific to this version

Sequence.description: A sequence of shots linked to creative intent.

Slate.title: Slate

name.title: Slate Name
name.description: A human readable name for the Slate

description.description: A brief description of the slate
description.title: Slate description

cameraLabel.title: Camera Label
cameraLabel.description: Label for the Camera responsible for the Capture, usually related to the role and responsibility of the group operating it and usually a single upper-case letter starting with A.

cameraUnit.title: Camera Unit
cameraUnit.description: A group of Participants responsible for shooting some element of a Scene, e.g., a Main Unit or Second Unit.

cameraRoll.title: Camera Roll
cameraRoll.description: Identifier for a group of events captured together on the same camera on the same media.

soundRoll.title: Sound Roll
soundRoll.description: Identifier for a group of audio events captured together on the same recording device and same media.

shootDate.title: Shoot Date
shootDate.description: The date of capture or creation

shootDay.title: Shoot Day
shootDay.description: The number of the day on the shooting schedule.

recordingFPS.title: Recording FPS
recordingFPS.description: Frames per second recorded by the camera.

Slate.description: Used to capture key identifying information about what is being recorded on any given setup and take.

SpecialAction.title: Special Action

name.title: Narrative Action Name
name.description: A human readable name for the action

description.title: Narrative Object Description
description.description: A brief description of the narrative action

actionType.title: Object type
actionType.description: A categorization of the type action.

SpecialAction.description: An action or set of actions that are performed and require additional choreography or supervision.

weight.title: weight
weight.description: Encode a measurement of weight using the imperial or metric system

oneOf.description: Encode weight using the metric system of measurement (kilogram, gram)
Encode weight using the imperial system of measurement (pounds, ounces)

dimensions.title: dimensions
dimensions.description: Encode a set of measurements to describe a 2 or 3 dimensional object (metric, imperial or pixels)

height.description: The height or X axis of the object

oneOf.description: Encode distance using the metric system of measurement (kilometer, meter, centimetre, millimeter
Encode distance using the imperial system of measurement (miles, feet, inches)
Encode a measurement of the number of pixels, typically in a digital image

width.description: The width or X axis of the object

oneOf.description: Encode distance using the metric system of measurement (kilometer, meter, centimetre, millimeter
Encode distance using the imperial system of measurement (miles, feet, inches)
Encode a measurement of the number of pixels, typically in a digital image

depth.description: The depth or Z axis of the object

oneOf.description: Encode distance using the metric system of measurement (kilometer, meter, centimetre, millimeter
Encode distance using the imperial system of measurement (miles, feet, inches)
Encode a measurement of the number of pixels, typically in a digital image

linearDistance.title: Linear Distance
linearDistance.description: Encode a measurement of distance using the imperial or metric system

oneOf.description: Encode distance using the metric system of measurement (kilometer, meter, centimetre, millimeter
Encode distance using the imperial system of measurement (miles, feet, inches)

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: An identifier uniquely identifies an entity within a particular scope.

identifierScope.title: Identifier Scope
identifierScope.description: The universe within which an identifier is valid and unique.

identifierValue.title: Identifier Value
identifierValue.description: A string of characters that uniquely identifies an object within a particular scope.

combinedForm.title: Identifier Combined Form
combinedForm.description: A combination of the Identifier Scope and Value that is useful for utilizing the identifier in a system, for example a URN (URN:ID:IdentifierScope:IdentifierValue).

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL or IRI that can be used for resolving the Identifier Value within the Identifier Scope.

address.title: Address

locality.title: Address locality
locality.description: The locality in which the street address is, and which is in the region.

region.title: Address region
region.description: The region in which the locality is, and which is in the country

address.description: A postal address or identifiable location of a place or building

country.title: Country
country.description: The country, as an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

basicName.title: Basic Name

fullName.title: Full Name
fullName.description: The full an complete name of the entity

altName.title: Alternate Name
altName.description: An alternate, often shortened name for the entity

basicName.description: A description of things name and an alternative name

completeName.title: Complete Name

firstGivenName.title: First Given Name
firstGivenName.description: A person's first name, also referred to as given name

secondGivenName.title: Second Given Name
secondGivenName.description: A persons second given name, also referred to as middle name

familyName.title: Family Name
familyName.description: A persons family name, also referred to as surname

fullName.title: Full Name
fullName.description: A complete name, typically a conjunction of familyName, firstGivenName and possibly other fields.

birthName.title: Birth Name
birthName.description: A persons name at birth, also referred to as maiden name

primaryName.title: Primary Name
primaryName.description: A persons primary name, one they typically use, also often a combination of first, second and family name

alias.title: Alias
alias.description: An alias being used by a person often used to disguise someones real identity, sometimes used when booking hotel rooms or restaurants

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: A prefix that can indicate a persons gender or title

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: A suffix, often used to indicate a title or classification

completeName.description: A detailed description of a person, or others, name and variants of their name.

gender.title: Gender
Identifies as gender
gender.description: The gender by which an individual identifies
A person, or others, expressed or prefered gender and pronoun

name.title: Location name
name.description: A human readable name for the location

description.title: Location Description
description.description: A brief description of the location

Location.title: Location
Location.description: A particular place or position either in either the real world or the narrative world.

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for the note or annotation

text.title: Text
text.description: The text of the note or annotation

eventInTime.title: Event in Time
eventInTime.description: Describes a specific event that occurred

dateTime.title: Date & Time
dateTime.description: Should be formatted to comply with ISO 8601

date.title: Date
date.description: Should be formatted to comply with ISO 8601

durationTime.title: Duration of Time
durationTime.description: Should be formatted to comply with ISO 8601

timecode.title:
SMPTE Timcode in the format HH:MM:SS:FF. 
Assumes the frame rate is 23.98, 24, 25, 29.97 NDF, or 30

coordinates.title: Coordinates
coordinates.description: A global positioning coordinate in compliance with WGS 84

versionNumber.title: Version Number
versionNumber.description: A designation indicating a place in a sequence of versions

Utility.title: Utility Definitions
Utility.description: Common data models and data structures used in multiple places and in multiple ways in a larger system.

core.title: Core

customData.title: Custom Data
customData.description: A user defined set of custom data in the payload of the instance, used where the formal schema lacks required properties

schemaVersion.title: Schema Version
schemaVersion.description: Describes the version of OMC-JSON schema that was used to create this instance

reference.title: Reference entity
reference.description: An identifier that references another entity in the graph

entityInfo.title: Entity Information
entityInfo.description: Reserved for future use to describe specific details about the instance of the entity

core.description: Helper objects used in building the schema
